snippet: The president of the French club Paris-St.Germain says that David Beckham will remain with the M.L.S. team in Los Angeles.
abstract: The president of the French club Paris-St.Germain says that David Beckham will remain with the M.L.S. team in Los Angeles.
lead_paragraph: David Beckham's days in Major League Soccer are apparently not over after all.

headline.main: Beckham Appears Likely to Stay With Galaxy
